name: A WEEBS REDEMPTION
description:
**the health bar is the iron ball which gets more broken the more you take damage

WARNING:

may offend some people

DESCRIPTION:

you play as a weeb, who questions his life, he has to fight his thoughts if he wants to stay the way he is. what is the correct choice? to change or not to change.

CONTROLS:

move: wasd

rotate: left/right arrow
